name: In dire help (Sands of Fate bug)
author: wanderei

posts.author: wanderei
posts.content:
So.. I am playing Sands of Fate module and after exposing Merchant Guildmaster I killed him and went down the stairs. Merchants were not hostile, just guards. I killed the guards and went to stables. For some reason Ox'es in the pen were hostile to me and my henchman went and killed them. Now when I came back up merchants were hostile. Sadly I made a quick save. I dont have other saves and ENTIRE TOWN is hostile to me. I would like to fix this with console commands but Im not sure what to type. 

 Ideally - what should I type in console ? some suggestions I found in the google say that should I press "P" to see factions but I have nothing there.


Any help will be welcome.

posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content: SpoilerYou killed him too quickly - he's supposed to teleport away and face you later on.
